alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Jefferson; Lonoke (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 11:43AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Lonoke, central Jefferson and west central Arkansas Counties through 1215 PM CDT... At 1143 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Cottondale, or near Pine Bluff, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts, winds in excess of 40 mph, and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pine Bluff... Altheimer... Humphrey... Cottondale... Richardson... Madding... Warbritton... Wabbaseka... Coy... Sherrill... Gethsemane... Cornerstone... Tomberlin... Glenlake... Rob Roy... Bayou Meteo State Game Area... Ladd... LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
